title: Ethm
author: Ethm
content: Welcome to the Ethereum Miner üíé‚õèEarn 5% Ethereum as per transaction. Accumulate more ETH tokens as you HODL!Contract - 0xdD2Ac77ea3823dFFA016eFD6083337c26cBf562c

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: How exactly does this work?You haven't shared many details. 5% Ether per transaction? Sounds like bullshit to me.

comments.author: Ben Barubal
comments.body: Quote from: Ethm on November 17, 2023, 07:58:09 PMWelcome to the Ethereum Miner üíé‚õèEarn 5% Ethereum as per transaction. Accumulate more ETH tokens as you HODL!Contract - 0xdD2Ac77ea3823dFFA016eFD6083337c26cBf562c¬† It seems like the information you provided is missing. How do I avail 5%? So what is the address you gave? Don't say that those who want to participate need to send an ETH amount of what you say is 5%.¬† If this is what you mean, that's a red flag to me, because this behavior of scammers is a scammer's style. So if I were you, you would explain properly so that you don't get a red flag account here on the forum. Smart community here, you might not know.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Ethm on November 17, 2023, 07:58:09 PMWelcome to the Ethereum Miner üíé‚õèEarn 5% Ethereum as per transaction. Accumulate more ETH tokens as you HODL!Contract - 0xdD2Ac77ea3823dFFA016eFD6083337c26cBf562cSo whats the avax on parenthesis means? So its running on the avax network but the name is ethereum miner? Is that so?¬† Is this a smart contract token or another memecoin that has a name of eth netwotk? Pretty confusing if theres a lot of these kind of tokens. 5% must be the reward upon joining right?
